subtitle: You need foods in many colours
description: You need foods in many colours
title: Should I eat differently?
content:
Created by BabyCenter

Now you are pregnant, it is important to try to eat well so your baby will grow well. You and your growing baby need lots of different foods. 

A simple way to think about it is to eat lots of different coloured foods! 

You could talk to your family about the foods you need.

Try to eat some of each of these food types every day: 


•	Fruits and vegetables. These protect your baby from being born with a problem.

•	Starchy foods. These include maize, cassava and sorghum. These foods give you energy.

•	Foods rich in protein. These include eggs, beans, chicken, fish, and meat. These are body building foods.

•	Calcium rich and dairy foods. These include milk, milk products, cheese, curds, chick peas and yoghurt. They help your baby grow strong bones.
